name: Clap Rally
description:
Made in Max 8 so no web version.

How to play:

  • Open the application.
  • Activate the audio by toggling the mic button.
  • Make sure the input and output in audio settings are correct.
  1. Clap.
  2. After X time, you'll hear a ping  (bounce).
  3. After X time, you'll hear a buzzy ping (CPU return).
  4. After Y time, you'll hear a ping (bounce).
  5. After Y time, clap to return, repeat from 2.
  6. If you miss the return, you'll hear a low buzz and as many dings as the length of your rally. Start over from 1.

Try to keep a rally going for as long as you can.

If it doesn't respond on start up, there may be an issue with your audio setup.

If it works at first then stops responding, it's probably bugged. Try closing and reopening.
